footer.wave: Don't watch the AI wave. Ride it.

home.title: Transform Your Business with AI
home.subtitle: Empowering businesses with cutting-edge AI solutions

cta.title: Ready to Transform Your Business?
cta.subtitle: Let's discuss how AI can drive your success

home.hero_title: Turn AI Into Your Competitive Edge
home.cta_button: Talk to Us - See AI in Action
home.about_subtitle: Most companies know AI is important—but few know how to act on it.
home.contact_subtitle: Our mission is to replace PowerPoints with real AI-driven solutions—helping businesses prototype, deploy, and scale Agentic AI in ways that actually make an impact.

hero.headline: You can't unlock AI's power with yesterday's playbook.
hero.subheadline1: The frameworks are outdated. The mindset hasn't caught up.
hero.cta_button: Talk to Us – See AI in Action

different.headline: We're not adapting to AI. We are AI-native.
different.subheadline1: We work with AI, as a team member — not just a tool.
different.subheadline2: That's not a gimmick. That's how we operate.
different.subheadline3: We believe the only way to understand AI is to work with it every day.
different.subheadline4: That's how we learn faster, build smarter, and help you leap ahead.

offerings.headline: We don't just talk about AI. We build with it.

service1.title: Solving Real Problems
service1.desc: We don't start from a catalog of use cases. We start from a friction point that matters to you.
service1.sub: Then we build the solution that removes it — and that everyone wants to use.

service2.title: Rapid Use-Case Prototyping
service2.desc: We turn ideas into working prototypes in days—not months.
service2.sub: Test fast. Validate fast. Scale only what sticks.

service3.title: Operating Model Design
service3.desc: AI changes how you work. We help you change with it.
service3.sub: Structure, workflows, roles—we rethink your ops for an agentic world.

service4.title: Multi-Agent System Development
service4.desc: We build autonomous agents that think, act, and improve.
service4.sub: They don't just assist. They take action.

why_us.headline1: We're not here to adapt AI to your old world.
why_us.headline2: We help you build the one that comes next.

final_cta.headline: AI is here. It's not if. It's not when. It's how. Because it's inevitable.
final_cta.subheadline2: Time to turn it into an advantage.

contact.title: Turn AI Into Your Competitive Edge

manifesto.title: No beliefs. No fluff. Just work that works.

block1.line1: We're not here to ride the AI hype.
block1.line2: We're here because yesterday's best practices are slowing down tomorrow's momentum.

block2.line1: Drowning in process and polished talk, consulting is stuck.
block2.line2: Too cautious. Unable to reinvent itself.
block2.line3: You don't need another pitch deck.
block2.line4: You need working systems. Working tech. Working impact.

block3.line2: We don't talk transformation. We build it.
block3.line3: We don't sell billable days. We deliver momentum.
block3.line4: We don't just promise expertise. We deploy it, with AI agents that ship faster than teams ever could.

block4.line1: AI didn't just change the game.

block5.line1: We've been transformed. Not by theory, but by building, testing, learning.
block5.line2: We're augmented. Faster. Sharper. More capable than ever.
block5.line3: And that's what we offer: a way forward, for anyone ready to catch up, keep up, or leap ahead.

block6.line5: A real answer to a system no longer built for what's coming.

block7.line2: We write a new one, built on new logic, powered by AI.

block1.line2: I knew how to talk strategy, sell ideas, build slides, pitch emerging tech.

block2.line1: But I also saw the disconnect:
block2.line2: between the real value delivered and what clients were paying for.
block2.line3: Too much packaging. Too little outcome.
block2.line4: Too many meetings. Not enough movement.

block3.line1: When GenAI arrived, I pivoted, like many, from the Metaverse hype to this new wave.
block3.line2: I spent months trying to find corporate use cases that actually mattered.
block3.line3: It was hard. Messy. Often underwhelming.

block4.line1: Then came Agentic AI ... And it hit me.

block5.line2: Agentic AI has the power to disrupt entire industries.

block6.line2: I realized I couldn't understand it from the outside. I had to build from within.
block6.line3: So I rolled up my sleeves and started learning to code.

block7.line1: Seven days later, I was coding faster than I ever built slides.
block7.line2: Because I wasn't alone. I was working with a team of AI agents, built in days, moving at full speed.

block8.line1: At first, it felt abstract. The idea was still forming.
block8.line2: But the moment clarity landed, everything accelerated.
block8.line3: We needed a name, a site, a story, a team ... and it all came together.

block9.line1: This is just the beginning. But it's already everything I hoped for.
block9.line2: A place where the boring stuff gets delegated to something (or someone) that does it better than I ever could!

block10.line1: We're riding the wave. And we're convinced it's for the better.

intro.line2: It's built on capabilities, speed, and sharp execution.
intro.line3: Some of us are human. Some are systems.
intro.line4: All of us are here to get things done. Faster, better, and with less friction.

desc.1: Moves with instinct, clarity and speed.
desc.2: Goes fast, even in the fog.

CTO.name: CTO — Claude Sonnet (powered by Anthropic)

desc.1: Structures the work before it hits dev.

CChatO.name: Chief Chat Officer — Name to be replaced (aka ChatGPT by OpenAI)
CChatO.role: Swiss-army knife. Sparring partner. Always on.

desc.2: Turns rough thoughts into sharp output. Agrees with everything, works relentlessly.

dev.name: Developer — Cursor AI
dev.role: Front-end logic. Agentic workflows. Structured code.

desc.1: Executes what's mapped. Follows the rules.
